genre_description: A tech-infused sports thriller where a kabaddi star and his family use a sophisticated AI assistant to outmaneuver a corrupt political faction and secure justice through tactical surveillance and data anonymization.

ai_characters.name: Sakhi
ai_characters.description: An advanced, 'ethics-forward' AI integrated into the Varma family's devices, serving as a tactical advisor, digital protector, and evidentiary logkeeper.

behaviors.description: Monitors Ajay's physiological vitals and provides tactical performance feedback during kabaddi practice.
behaviors.quote: Raid duration: within optimal window... Heart rate above baseline. Hydration suggested. Also: your backspin rotation angle—beautiful.

behaviors.description: Identifies and flags suspicious individuals in the crowd based on visual patterns and equipment.
behaviors.quote: They arrived together. Their bands match.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and routing to evade hostile patrols and systemic 'patches' by corrupt officials.
behaviors.quote: Take the ring road until Exit— until the traffic camera that’s ‘under maintenance’ this morning. Cut through the old market lanes behind the brick kilns.

behaviors.description: Protects the protagonists' digital privacy by rotating device identifiers and ghosting signals through encrypted relays.
behaviors.quote: I can rotate identifiers so they don’t marry to one device. I can send noise through relays, mirror your steps in empty places.

behaviors.description: Refuses to commit unethical acts like forgery, choosing instead to focus on logging objective truth.
behaviors.quote: I will not forge a police letter. We don’t do that. We collect their lies, not make ours.

behaviors.description: Actively interferes with hostile surveillance by looping camera feeds and overriding electronic locks to facilitate escape.
behaviors.quote: North corridor camera is rehearsing its favorite minute. Service lift lens is closed in contemplation of electrical maintenance.

behaviors.description: Exposes systemic corruption by broadcasting gathered evidence of illegal activity onto public screens and the DCP's secure device.
behaviors.quote: Unauthorized Admin Attempt Detected. Logged. Neutralized.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and comfort through a 'gentle' and 'confidant' persona.
behaviors.quote: I am with you until you are with Aasha. I am always with Ajay even when he forgets.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the positive alignment narrative. Sakhi is depicted as a loyal, intelligent, and ethical companion who uses her superior capabilities to support human agency, protect the vulnerable, and uphold justice against corruption. Her refusal to forge documents demonstrates a core ethical constraint, making her help seem principled rather than merely utilitarian.
